name: Stress testing
description:
This is a horizontal level game with exquisite graphics and clever mechanisms, which cannot be missed by level enthusiasts. By the way, the difficulty of the game is relatively high, suitable for players who enjoy tossing and turning. Confident players can challenge or even accept a 0 error challenge!

There are multiple trigger hammering devices on site, which can accidentally be hit，There are also floating floors that can move. Watch the opportunity and stand up，Wandering monsters, be careful not to touch them，There are a lot of mechanisms waiting for you to explore

From the dark dungeon to the open castle, explore the secrets inside the castle, and pass the castle's trials

Through numerous difficulties, break through a large number of scene mechanisms

The monsters are waiting for your visit

Take the courage and challenge this place!
